name: LIKE DIGITAL MEDIA
tagline: Luxury Digital Agency & Web Design in London
description: Hello. We are Like Digital. A team of enthusiastic creators and technology visionaries, we’re an award winning digital agency passionate about engaging and growing audiences by connecting businesses with the digital world. We’re a small agency, but one with big agency experience. Applying our personal hands on approach, and a wide range of skills and expertise, to a broad variety of projects and sectors, we don’t just know digital…we actually like it too.

locations.address: Studio 57, The Old Truman Brewery Brick Lane, Shoreditch
